actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The alchemist attacks twice with their dagger.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Bomb (3/Day)
actions.desc: The alchemist lobs a bomb at a point they can see within 80 feet. Upon impact  the bomb explodes in a 10-foot radius. Creatures in the area make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw  taking 24 (7d6) fire damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Alter Bomb
bonus_actions.desc: The alchemist quickly swaps reagents to change the damage dealt by their next bomb to acid, cold, lightning, poison, or thunder.

bonus_actions.name: Potion
bonus_actions.desc: The alchemist drinks or administers a potion.

reactions.name: Desperate Drink (1/Day
reactions.desc: When the alchemist is dealt damage, they drink a potion.

reactions.name: Alchemists brew concoctions with potent magical and chemical properties
reactions.desc: Some alchemists perform dangerous experiments to perfect new alchemical recipes, while others fabricate guardians and other constructs in pursuit of the creation of life itself.

special_abilities.name: Alchemy Schooling
special_abilities.desc: The alchemist gains their proficiency bonus and an expertise die (+1d6) on checks made with alchemists supplies.

special_abilities.name: Crafting
special_abilities.desc: So long as the alchemist has the required components and equipment, they are able to craft potions of up to legendary rarity and other magic items of up to very rare rarity.

special_abilities.name: Potion Crafter
special_abilities.desc: The alchemist has the following potions on hand:

special_abilities.name: Potion of climbing
special_abilities.desc: For 1 hour, the drinker gains a climb speed equal to its Speed and has advantage on Athletics checks made to climb

special_abilities.name: Potion of water breathing
special_abilities.desc: For 1 hour, the drinker can breathe underwater
